SELECT sum(APPLY_MONEY) as withdrawTotal FROM MALL_SHOPS_WITHDRAW T where (apply_status =1 or apply_status =2 or apply_status =4)
AND T.USER_ID = #{params.userId}

SELECT T.ID, T.USER_ID, T.APPLY_TYPE, T.APPLY_TIME, T.APPLY_MONEY, T.APPROVER, T.APPROVAL_TIME, T.APPROVAL_REMARK, T.WITHDRAW_USER_ID, T.APPLY_STATUS, T.COMMISSION, SU.USER_NAME as USER_NAME, MS.NAME as SHOPS_NAME, MS.SHOPS_SN as SHOPS_SN, SU.MOBILE as MOBILE FROM MALL_SHOPS_WITHDRAW T LEFT JOIN SYS_USER SU on SU.USER_ID = T.USER_ID LEFT JOIN MALL_SHOPS MS on MS.id = T.SHOPS_ID WHERE 1=1
AND T.ID = #{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT T.ID, T.FROM_TYPE, T.ORDER_TYPE, T.ORDER_SN, T.USER_ID, T.ORDER_STATUS, T.SHIPPING_STATUS, T.PAY_STATUS, T.PAY_TYPE, T.CONSIGNEE, T.COUNTRY, T.PROVINCE, T.CITY, T.DISTRICT, T.ADDRESS, T.POSTAL_CODE, T.MOBILE, T.POSTSCRIPT, T.SHIPPING_ID, T.SHIPPING_NAME, T.SHIPPING_CODE, T.SHIPPING_NO, T.SHIPPING_FEE, T.PREPAY_ID, T.ACTUAL_PRICE, T.INTEGRAL_MONEY, T.ORDER_PRICE, T.ADD_TIME, T.CONFIRM_TIME, T.PAY_TIME, T.COUPON_ID, T.COUPON_PRICE, T.PARENT_ID, T.SHOPS_ID, T.GOODS_ID, T.EXPIRE_TIME, U.NICKNAME, S.NAME SHOPS_NAME, S.SHOPS_SN, SU.USER_NAME ADMIN_USER_NAME, SU.MOBILE ADMIN_MOBILE FROM MALL_ORDER T LEFT JOIN MALL_USER U ON T.USER_ID = U.ID LEFT JOIN MALL_SHOPS S ON T.SHOPS_ID = S.ID LEFT JOIN SYS_USER SU ON S.USER_ID = SU.USER_ID
